message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'd be interested in. I'm asking for $200 for it, but I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $170? This would still allow me to make a decent profit while also being fair to you.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $170, so how about $145?
